mapper.select: select count(*) from TB_EVENT where company_id=#{company_id} and eve_state=1
mapper.update: update TB_EVENT set eve_state=#{eve_state} where event=#{event}
mapper.select: select e.EVENT as EVENT, COMPANY_ID, EVE_START_DATE,ec.CS_COUNT as CS_COUNT,DB_PRICE,EVE_STATE,CS_NOTE from (select * from TB_EVENT where company_id=#{company_id}) e left outer join(select event, count(event) as CS_COUNT from TB_EVE_REQ where company_id=#{company_id} group by event) ec on e.event = ec.event
mapper.insert: Insert into TB_EVENT (company_id, event, eve_start_date, cs_count, db_price, eve_state, cs_note, banner_image, detail_image) Values(#{company_id},#{event},now(),0,2000,1,'테스트',#{banner_image},#{detail_image});
mapper.update: update TB_EVE_REQ set cs_state=#{cs_state} where event=#{event} and user_id=#{user_id}
update TB_COMPANY_INFO set company_phone=#{company_phone}, company_letter=#{company_letter} where company_id=#{company_id}
